content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment in Duisburg to be a great place to live. How much are you willing to pay for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I think a reasonable price for a newly built apartment in the city center would be around 600 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but that's much lower than what I'm looking for. My apartment is quite luxurious and located in a prime area. I'm hoping for a rent closer to 900 Euros per month. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point, but considering the unfurnished state of the apartment and the current real estate market, I think we can find a middle ground. How about 750 Euros per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 750 Euros is still quite low for the quality and location of this apartment. I'm willing to go up to 850 Euros per month, but that's the lowest I can accept. What's your final offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your flexibility. Considering the unfurnished state of the apartment, I think it would be fair to rent it for 800 Euros per month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: 800 Euros is closer to what I'm looking for, but I still think my apartment is worth a bit more. How about we meet in the middle at 825 Euros per month? It's a fair price considering the location and amenities nearby. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That sounds more reasonable. I agree to the price of 825 Euros per month!
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I'm glad we could come to an agreement. Welcome to your new home! Please let me know if you have any questions or need assistance with anything.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, I appreciate that. I don't have any more questions about the rental price. Do you have any contracts or documents I need to sign?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yes, I'll prepare the contract for you. Please make sure to read it carefully before signing. In the meantime, I'll also provide you with information about the apartment's utilities and any additional responsibilities you may have as a tenant. Once you're ready, we can arrange a time for you to come by and sign the lease.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
